relevant_communication:
Recently conducted a fact finding report in Pakistan on the persecution of the Ahmadiyya Muslim Community in conjunction with the Asian Human Rights Commission.  Experts from around the world were procured who undertook this project and this was the first comprehensive report of its type which was launched at the UN Human Rights Council session at a side event. 
 
Previous projects have included working on minority issues in the Middle East and securing the release of 2 individuals in Saudi. 
 
Currently working on minority issues in Europe and South Asia with a fact finding mission planned in the next few months.
goals__remit: An independent organisation dedicated to defending, promoting and protecting human rights, focusing specifically freedom of religion and belief issues. The IHRC has specific expertise and experience in this area working on minority issues and freedom of religion or belief
